import{createTheme}from'@mui/material/styles';// mui theme settings
export var themeSettings=function themeSettings(){return{ERROR_COLOR:'#d8342c',typography:{fontFamily:['Source Sans Pro','sans-serif'].join(','),fontSize:12,h1:{fontFamily:['Source Sans Pro','sans-serif'].join(','),fontSize:40},h2:{fontFamily:['Source Sans Pro','sans-serif'].join(','),fontSize:32},h3:{fontFamily:['Source Sans Pro','sans-serif'].join(','),fontSize:24},h4:{fontFamily:['Source Sans Pro','sans-serif'].join(','),fontSize:20},h5:{fontFamily:['Source Sans Pro','sans-serif'].join(','),fontSize:16},h6:{fontFamily:['Source Sans Pro','sans-serif'].join(','),fontSize:14}}};};export var useMode=function useMode(){var theme=createTheme(themeSettings());return[theme];};
